response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering the quality and benefits it offers, I am proposing to sell it to you for $12,000. This price reflects its true value while allowing us to cover our costs and ensure a fair transaction. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 12000}
